name: Emoji World 2: The Zodiac Quest
description:
For all those fans of this type of game, here comes the sequel of the first platformer created using exclusively emoji icons: Emoji World 2: The Zodiac Quest.

Play levels over 12 different worlds to recover lost zodiac signs and face the evil being that stole them. Discover a game with up to 36 levels with different game modes that will delight those looking for a game that propose them a good challenge, because the difficulty is very tight as to enjoy hardcore players and newbies.

The game has been fully developed by one independent programmer, using only free web resources (images, backgrounds, sounds and music).

Download it!
